name: 陳文輝
objective: The goal of this course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.
schedule:
1.　　Course Introduction
2.　　Ubiquitous Computing
3.　　Smart Environments
4.　　Human Activity Recognition
5.　　Paper Review and Readings on Deep Learning
6.　　Business Visit (Living 3.0)
7.　　Project Presentations
scorePolicy:
1.　　Participation and Assignments: 50%
2.　　Midterm  25%
3.　　Project Presentations 25%
